alert.note: Alert for Garfield; Holt; Loup; Wheeler (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 21 at 8:45PM CDT by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT SOUTHEASTERN LOUP...GARFIELD... SOUTHEASTERN HOLT AND WHEELER COUNTIES THROUGH 945 PM CDT... At 845 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from O`Neill to 11 miles northwest of Ericson to near Fort Hartsuff State Park. Movement was southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... O`Neill, Burwell, Ewing, Chambers, Page, Bartlett, Ericson, Amelia, Calamus Reservoir State Recreation Area, Inman, Emmet, Knievels Corner, Virginia Smith Dam, Buffalo Flats, Carson Lake, Sunfish Lake, Homestead Knolls Campground, Cumminsville, Four Corners, and Pibel Lake State Recreation Area. This includes the following highways... Highway 20 between mile markers 295 and 328. Highway 281 between mile markers 132 and 184. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
